widget.description: JSON for the estimated delivery times by country.
widget.label: JSON

input.name: containerTemplate
input.value:
Estimated Delivery
    {{ITEMS}}

widget.label: Accordion Container Template
widget.description: Accordion container template HTML. Using the {{ITEMS}} placeholder will be replaced by the estimated delivery items.

widget.label: Item Template
widget.description: HTML Template for each of the estimated delivery items. You can use any of the values from the JSON. Examples: {{Method}}, {{Days}}, {{Carrier}}, etc.
Function to use when inserting the banner relative to the selected node
widget.label: Insert Function
Banner Div Inline Styles
widget.description: A string of inline styles to set on the banner div.

widget.label: Script
widget.description: Please enter valid JavaScript. Note that changes you make to existing JavaScript creatives will not be saved for use in other actions.
CSS appended to the DOM in a <style> or <link> element. Use selector "#MONETATE-ID" to target the inserted element.
widget.label: CSS
Select multiple elements, if matched?
widget.description: If multiple elements match the specified CSS3 selector, should the change be applied to all of them, or just the first one?

widget.label: Re-check for Elements
widget.description: If elements are not found, keep checking every 50ms for up to 3 seconds. Useful for content loaded asynchronously (ajax).

widget.label: Only run once?
widget.description: If true, JS will only be inserted on first track and not on subsequent retracks.
